description: Skill
String
Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use for building web components, pages, dashboards, React components, HTML/CSS layouts, or styling any web UI.
Comprehensive PDF manipulation toolkit for extracting text and tables, creating new PDFs, merging/splitting documents, and handling forms.
Comprehensive spreadsheet creation, editing, and analysis with support for formulas, formatting, data analysis, and visualization.
Comprehensive document creation, editing, and analysis with support for tracked changes, comments, formatting preservation, and text extraction.
Presentation creation, editing, and analysis for PowerPoint files including layouts, formatting, speaker notes, and content modification.
Guide for creating high-quality MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers that enable LLMs to interact with external services through well-designed tools.
Guide for creating effective skills that extend Claude's capabilities with specialized knowledge, workflows, or tool integrations.
Structured workflow for co-authoring documentation, proposals, technical specs, and decision docs. Three-stage process: context gathering, iterative refinement, and reader testing.
Create beautiful visual art in .png and .pdf documents using design philosophy. Use for creating posters, art, designs, or other static visuals.
Creating algorithmic art using p5.js with seeded randomness and interactive parameter exploration. Use for generative art, flow fields, or particle systems.
Toolkit for interacting with and testing local web applications using Playwright. Supports verifying frontend functionality, debugging UI behavior, and capturing screenshots.
Applies official brand colors, typography, and styling to artifacts. Use for creating branded content, marketing materials, or maintaining design consistency.
Write internal communications using company formats. Use for status reports, leadership updates, newsletters, FAQs, incident reports, or project updates.
Automated code review for pull requests using specialized review patterns. Analyzes code for quality, security, performance, and best practices.
Modern Python development with Python 3.12+, Django, FastAPI, async patterns, and production best practices. Use for Python projects, APIs, or automation.
JavaScript and TypeScript development with ES6+, Node.js, React, and modern web frameworks. Use for frontend, backend, or full-stack projects.
Backend API design, database architecture, microservices patterns, and test-driven development. Use for designing APIs, database schemas, or backend systems.
Database schema design, optimization, and migration patterns for PostgreSQL, MySQL, and NoSQL databases. Use for designing schemas or optimizing queries.
Code refactoring patterns and techniques for improving code quality without changing behavior. Use for cleaning up legacy code or reducing complexity.
Building applications with Large Language Models - prompt engineering, RAG patterns, and LLM integration. Use for AI-powered features or chatbots.
Writing effective code documentation - API docs, README files, inline comments, and technical guides. Use for documenting codebases or APIs.
Automate QA regression testing with reusable Playwright tests. Login flows, dashboard checks, user creation, and composable test suites.
Write tailored cover letters and job applications using your CV and preferred style. Paste a job description and get a personalized cover letter instantly.
Create elaborate HTML artifacts using React, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui. Use for building interactive web components and demos.
Create user-facing changelogs from git commits. Transforms technical commits into customer-friendly release notes.
Extract and analyze competitors' ads from ad libraries. Understand messaging and creative approaches.
Research and write high-quality content with citations. Improves hooks and provides section feedback.
Analyze developer growth metrics and patterns. Track progress and identify improvement areas.
Generate creative domain name ideas and check availability across TLDs including .com, .io, .dev, .ai.
Intelligently organize files and folders. Find duplicates and suggest better organizational structures.
Improve image and screenshot quality. Enhance resolution, sharpness, and clarity for professional use.
Organize invoices and receipts for tax prep. Read files, extract info, and rename consistently.
Identify and qualify high-quality leads. Analyze products, search for targets, and provide outreach strategies.
Analyze meeting transcripts for behavioral patterns. Speaking ratios, filler words, and leadership style.
Randomly select winners for giveaways and contests. Cryptographically secure randomness.
Create animated GIFs optimized for Slack. Validators for size constraints and composable animations.
Apply professional font and color themes to artifacts. 10 pre-set themes for slides, docs, and HTML.
Download videos from YouTube and other platforms. Various formats and quality options.
Layer 6 cognitive modeling engine for building psychological profiles, training predictors, and generating authentic interactions. Core of the Barton Cognitive Surrogate System.
Layer 4 learning and pattern extraction. Train interaction predictors, extract temporal/topic patterns, discover latent skills from behavior.
Layer 1 Bluesky/AT Protocol data acquisition. Fetch posts, engagement graphs, stream mentions, extract thread trees.
Layer 5 interaction interleaving for maximum information gain. Arrange sequences to maximize learning efficiency.
Layer 7 interperspectival network analysis. Trace idea adoption, second-order networks, topic propagation, reach multipliers.
GF(3) triadic task routing for subagent orchestration. Route tasks to MINUS/ERGODIC/PLUS skill triads with conservation.
Layer 3 temporal versioning and ACSet schema generation for DuckDB. Time travel queries, version management, GF(3) verification views.
Cross-language Strong Parallelism Invariance verification. Ensure SPI seed 0xf061ebbc2ca74d78 produces identical sequences across 15+ languages.
Layer 1 real-time social stream monitoring via MCP. Subscribe to actors, monitor engagement deltas, detect network trends.
Hypothesis-test loops via REPL for exploratory abductive inference. Generate hypotheses from observations, test, refine iteratively.
Play/Coplay autopoietic closure with UnwiringRules for learning through constraint release. Arena Protocol v0.4 (Amelia) with NATS topics and WEV extraction.
Deterministic color generation with SplitMix64, GF(3) trits, and MCP tools for palettes and threads. Same seed → Same colors (SPI guarantee).
Interleave three deterministic color streams into balanced schedules for parallel execution. GF(3) sum = 0 per triplet, order preserved per stream.
Attacker/Defender/Arbiter game for resilient skill dispersal across AI agents. GF(3) conservation and observational bridge types for version control.
ACSets (Attributed C-Sets): Algebraic databases as in-memory data structures. Category-theoretic formalism generalizing graphs and data frames.
Badiou-inspired possible world navigation using triangle inequality constraints, event ontology, and truth procedures for traversing mathematical possibility space.
Verify Strong Parallelism Invariance (SPI) and GF(3) conservation for 3-way color streams with arbitrary precision. Seed 0xf061ebbc2ca74d78 reference.
Wide-gamut color sampling with splittable determinism using Pigeons.jl SPI pattern and LispSyntax integration.
Modern macOS audio loopback driver for inter-application audio routing with minimal latency.
Rust-native Fish shell file operations with Steel-backed SCI Clojure evaluation. Seed 1069.
Didactic Ersatz Emacs demonstrating immutable data-structures and single-atom architecture.
Collaborative terminal sharing using CRDT sexps with GF(3) trifurcated conflict resolution.
Sheaves on time categories for compositional temporal reasoning. Bumpus et al. narrative framework with Gay.jl color integration.
Nix store modeled as Attributed C-Set for dependency verification and world management.
World memory is world remembering is world worlding - the autopoietic strange loop where memory enables remembering enables worlding enables memory.
On-chain GF(3) entropy storage via Aptos Move - bulk-boundary correspondence where entropy lives in the interior and observables project to agents.
Stanford FDCI research bridge: Boneh cryptographic primitives (ZK, BLS, VRFs) + Roughgarden mechanism design (TFM, MEV mitigation). WEV = World Extractable Value via GF(3) conservation.
